Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

excuse me if this question have been already asked but I can't find any answer by my own...

Did I do something wrong ? Am I an idiot ? Those parts can't be attached together or what ? I tried and tried to dock but maybe those two parts are not meant to dock together...Can someone answer me on this point ?

Thank you very much !

Despite its appearance, the multi-point hub does not come with built-in docking rings. If you don't add them, its sides are just inert surfaces, and you can not dock to it. Don't feel bad, though. This is an extremely common mistake, and just about everybody has done it once or twice.
